website_summaries.verdict: The Nike Revolution 3 is a reasonably priced, sturdily built, and intelligently designed neutral road running shoe that’s suitable for individuals who are looking for high comfortability and an excellent energy return. The shoe’s spacious toe-box, which makes it suitable for wide-footers as well.
pros: The customers mentioned that the Nike Revolution 3 was a pair of ‘most comfortable’ shoes they had ever run in
The users appreciated how their feet remained dry and cool during their runs, owing to the breathable mesh upper
An individual called the snug fit of the shoe simply ‘perfect’
Several purchasers liked the overall look of the Nike Revolution 3, stating that it was appealing to look at
Most buyers thought that this running shoe was priced very reasonably
A wide-footer found the apparently very spacious toe-box to be excellent for his foot
A regular wearer of the Revolution 3 experienced no back pain owing to the shoe’s excellent cushioning in the heel region
cons: A few users had doubts over the quality of the shoe
they reported that some of its components already fell apart after only a few uses

customer_reviews.title: All form or substance - looks great but a nightmare to wear
customer_reviews.text: First off, I wouldn't consider this much of a running shoe. It doesn't have much bounce or shock absorption. Second the foam in the heel is lower on the instep, making the runners posture lean to the inside (pigeon toed on the right foot). Third, the 10.5 shoe is no where near a D width on the right foot - maybe an A or B width to the toe is really tight across the top despite having extra length. Of course the red tennis shows look great so if that's what you need, go for it - just don't try to run in them or wear them for more than 1 hour.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Nistler

customer_reviews.title: Size 4e review
customer_reviews.text: It has always been extremely hard to find shoes because my feet are wide. I ordered the 4e size and my feet literally slid in without having to loosen up the laces.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Hurtado

customer_reviews.title: Holy crap, what a good shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, bro: buy these shoes. I've been wearing mine every day for like 2.5 years and there's still life in them. And maybe I've had a more comfortable pair of shoes in my life, but I couldn't name them, not even if I was being waterboarded. If you're a runner, note that I would rather be hit by a car than run more than 50 feet. I just walk around in them, and as little as possible at that. But still.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Ets Hokin

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.  Fit as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fitting shoe. I wear them all day at work and then to the gym to run in. One of the most comfortable pairs of shoes I have owned. Fit exactly as expected. Great arch support and very breathable. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bought a size 8 and 13 in this style shoe. We are donating them to a local school for boys who need new shoes. When I received them they were sizes 12, and 13. I thought that made a mistake but upon repurchasing this same shoe in the size 8 it showed that it was available so I placed it in my cart. However, when I went to place order it showed again I was purchasing a size 12. I redone this 3 more times and every time it they in my cart a size 12. I have never had this happen before. All buyers beware and check that before you check out make sure sizes are correct.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer James

customer_reviews.title: The shoes seem to be fairly comfortable but the quality doesnt seem to be the best ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes seem to be fairly comfortable but the quality doesnt seem to be the best but I only knocked off one star because theyre only $60 bucks and cheap Nikes only last about a year or so anyway before they need to be repalced. Im guessing that the flap of fabric that is not glued down inside my left shoe (but is glued down in the right shoe) Will not be a factor before I would normally get rid of them anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Greywolf74

customer_reviews.title: These are nice shoes with some minor modifications
customer_reviews.text: These are nice shoes with some minor modifications. They look good, and they're reasonably sturdy, mostly. The insoles and laces the shoes come with are thin, cheap, and feel like they'll wear out quickly. If you replace them though it also makes the shoes a lot more comfortable. I get the impression that these shoes were manufactured to fit a particular price range, so some compromises were made to keep costs down. Still, at least the cheap bits are easily, and commonly, replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Sefton

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but flimsy
customer_reviews.text: These fit as they should,and are comfortable. DAD GRIPE: Disappointed that almost all of Nike's athletic shoes these days are made so flimsy. No leather, just that "in style" nylon mesh. Disposable shoes.... go figure. Can't really see these holding their shape more than a month, or staying in one piece past a year.
customer_reviews.author: Skullywag

customer_reviews.title: Great Nike Running Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Fit is very good, used it running yesterday. Although I have flat feet (I use high end inserts/orthotics), these shoes were very comfortable. The width is perfect for my wide feet (had to send the NB shoes bought in same transaction back, surprisingly). These Nike shoes are very comfortable and a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Rich From Whidbey

customer_reviews.title: Just order the right size
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and unfortunately they were too small but it was my fault not the sellers. I wear a 13 and for some reason I bought a 12 note here’s the bad part is that I wore them thinking maybe they would stretch. I only wore them two times but in good conscience I couldn’t send them back because I did after all wear them so I found someone that needed a new pair shoes and they wore a size 12. It’s sort of like paying it forward? Anyway they are great shoes for this other guy and they would’ve been great For me if I had smaller feet. All good.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Deneke

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes; comfortable, lightweight and stylish.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Very comfortable, lightweight, stylish and so far durable. I'm a bit a shoe guy with a wide foot (4E) and was skeptical of Nike because in the past they always seemed narrow but these I love and wear them for walking all the time.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wayne Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: First off the shoe looks good and looks well made, I don't think I'll have an issue with it falling apart... other than that I am very disappointed. They feel as if my ankles are bent inward. I wore them around for a few weeks to brake (part the return period to my own fault) before running in them. Running in them made my legs hurt, and the rear of the shoe left painful cuts on my Achilles (I tried different socks but nothing seemed to help). I would steer clear of these if you plan to run in them.
customer_reviews.author: ShoelessMo

customer_reviews.title: X-wide is really wide
customer_reviews.text: Well the width size have 2 options only. Normal and x-wide or 4e. I normally need 13 2e sizing. So I got a 4e and finds it being rather too large for me. Though it's much better than getting it narrower for most cases when I get a normal size 13 without any options in the width. So the shoes are wearable. Being an overseas purchase I think it's rather inconvenient to return. So I'll just wear it since its not uncomfortable. My advice those who. Are wearing 2e maybe go 0.5 smaller in the wide size. Or if returning is convenient just try the normal width.
customer_reviews.author: Skar

customer_reviews.title: No ankle support
customer_reviews.text: I've been a Nike shoe guy for years and so far I've no reason to change that fact. These shoes are no exception: they look great, feel great, and work well. My only complaint is a small one, but it could potentially be a larger one for others: there's very little ankle support. To be fair, I do have custom insoles for my flat-feet, but they're not exactly that thick, which is why it surprises there's such a lack of ankle support. It hasn't caused any issues yet, but it is concerning for when I do more strenuous exercises such as hiking. Time will tell overall, but otherwise I think these are a fantastic pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Zavage

customer_reviews.title: Two left shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I received two left shoes. I didn’t notice until my son needed the next size and was outside the return window. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: slp&mom

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this show for 3 months. The in soul fell apart on 9/4/18. The out soul is faded and ripped. The support is weak! I would never buy this shoe or any Nike products again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thankfully a fit
customer_reviews.text: It's almost impossible to find fashionable and comfortable Men's size 14 narrow or medium. When you search, lots come up but when you go to choose by size, nothing. I was really looking for a white running shoe but every white regardless of trim color didn't have a size 14. This is a little darker gray than I wanted but in the end, it looks and fits great and hubby is happy so I am happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are excellent running shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent running shoes. I only paid about $68.00 for these shoes; they are as good as any running shoe I ever bought. I have been buying this same basic style in women's shoes for my daughters for years and they have always done the job. In fact, I bought these shoes for one girl who is big and muscular and she prefers them.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Jenson

customer_reviews.title: Best Nike Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I can only wear Nike running shoes. Preferably the flexible fabric type with light weight molding. Overall, this pair was great. I had no issues and got it for a fair price. I used this pair for about 8 months, then I snapped the back. I never unpack, always slide shoes on. Bad habit. I'd buy again! I think this model is still out, but it's been a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Skylar Hartnett

customer_reviews.title: These shoes fall apart immediately
customer_reviews.text: I'm surprised they're ranked so well. These things just fall apart immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: GOOD SHOCK ABSORPTION
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes. Excellent shock absorption. I use them for exercise walking on asphalt and concrete. A little expensive for screen printed designs, but you pay for the name and I needed the brand to show support for Kaepernick.
customer_reviews.author: Walleyeman

customer_reviews.title: Nike is the best
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my brother who has a very wide feet and it is hard to find the sneakers that fit him comfortable. Its great that Nike produces the special ones for people who have huge feet. The only complaint is it doesn’t look so trendy but good enough anyway for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lombardo

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Good design. Comfortable when walking. The fabric in the front can be a problem. The shape of the front part is deformed when the shoe is worn due to the thinness of the fabric. Be careful in contact with water.
customer_reviews.author: ECO_77

customer_reviews.title: 4E mostly comfortable. Laces way too short.
customer_reviews.text: 13 4E is a good fit where I normally wear 6E. The laces are only 42 inches and way too short so you have to buy longer laces for wide feet. The shoe is very light and colors are excellent. Glad I got the last pair for 60 but found another on Flea Bay for 55 so all is good.
customer_reviews.author: CatDaddy & Biatch

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Nice enough to keep, but not impressive enough to buy again. Size seems to run a little on the large scale. Like close to 1/8th inch longer at least. For the price... probably would've been just fine with champions brand. But I've had worse so they are worth keeping.
customer_reviews.author: JRod

customer_reviews.title: Like walking on rocks
customer_reviews.text: No arch support, I can feel all the pattern from the bottom. Poor cushioning. Will return.. uncomfortable!
customer_reviews.author: arlon knudson

customer_reviews.title: I've Been Wearing Size 11 for Ten Years
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing Nike size 11 shoes for 10 years. All my previous (and current) Nike size 11 shoes start off a little snug; but, after a few days they fit perfectly. These, however, were like clown shoes. Way, way too big. Comically big. Stupidly big. They also seem cheaper than the other pairs I currently own. Returned
customer_reviews.author: Justin Epstein

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoe
customer_reviews.text: The Nike Revolution 3 is a reasonably priced, sturdily built, and intelligently designed neutral road running shoe that’s suitable for individuals who are looking for high comfortability and an excellent energy return. The shoe’s spacious toe-box, which makes it suitable for wide-footers as well. I personally love this shoe
customer_reviews.author: Carmel

customer_reviews.title: good deal
customer_reviews.text: my son has super big feet and they are,wide too and its almost impossible to find any stylish sneakers in a triple E width. He runs xc and indoor track and he rips through sneakers every three months so to find his size and a bargain in a trendy running shoe is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: heidiw

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable wide shoe
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable wide shoe I’ve owned. Bought my second pair when my first ones began to get dirty from outside use. Now I’ve got a great yard work pair and a new pair for going out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable running shoes I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable running shoes I've ever owned. I have super wide feet, and 4E fits perfect. Bought this pair to throw on the shelf till the pair I bought last fall wears out (still going strong). Wish they had other colors in 4E.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: They don't make them like they used to!
customer_reviews.text: They fell apart like most Nike sneakers these days. Always in the front and they always come unglued. You are lucky if your Nike shoes last more than six months! None of my kids' Nikes last more than a few months before the glue falls apart and th rubber peels away.
customer_reviews.author: MomofFour

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son who typically wears a size 15. The 15 were a tad too long for him. We exchanged for the size 14 and he loves them. He said they are very comfortable! He also likes the low profile of the black color. Versatile.
customer_reviews.author: DeeAnn Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: For my big flat feet these are the e best shoes I could find. My only problem wth them was the crappy laces that all Nike sneakers come with nowadays. I'll just have to get my laces somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: PJ Appleton

customer_reviews.title: Not on point
customer_reviews.text: Had to return due to sizing. All my other Nike running shoes are 11.5 but this shoe was definitely too big. Seemed like a light trainer that would be comfortable for long runs. Liked the styling.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, very nice fit with just enough arch support. I'm on my feet 12 hours a night at work and these are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: KDude

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: These Nikes are beautiful! They are light weight, comfortable and you can’t beat the price. I have another pair in a different color as well. I love these running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Q

customer_reviews.title: These are the shoes you're looking for
customer_reviews.text: Basic black and white? Check. Light? Check. Comfortable? Totally check. And thankfully, not ridiculously expensive like most Nike's are these days. Really enjoying them so far and I'm glad I got them!
customer_reviews.author: Sosai X

customer_reviews.title: Great price.
customer_reviews.text: Great price. I probably need a little wider shoe than this one to be more comfortable. Had to redo the shoe strings to provide more give (and I skipped a couple of the holes on the top for added flexibility. Shoes are light weight, so good for running, which I do a lot of.
customer_reviews.author: bidask

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy the white ones!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy the white ones! Worn a few times at most, been sitting in my closet. But the entire back of the shoe, that covers the back of your foot/heel has turned brown! Also on top where the shoe laces are, it's pretty ridiculous. Same spots on both shoes too!! Unfortunately it's too late for me to get a refund so I'm screwed out of $70. NOT HAPPY
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great cheaper running shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Lost a bunch of weight and decided to take up walking and running to keep it off. Picked these up and I couldn't be happier. Completely reconsidering what shoes actually make my feet hurt now because these are absolutely great. Very light and comfortable. The only issue I have is that the colorway is not what was pictured, and could technically match either the actual shoe or what was pictured. Still, very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: I used to have a similar pair that I liked but these shoes are not good quality
customer_reviews.text: I used to have a similar pair that I liked but these shoes are not good quality. After one weekend of wearing these the mesh like material on the toe was already frayed/ripped/torn. Not satisfied with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comftorable
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a maintenance tech at an apartment complex, so he walks All day. He wears these daily to work and says they are very comfortable. He's had them for a few months and they are still in great condition
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle Forkey

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after one month.
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, looks great on, but the soles started to fall off by the toe area right away. Tried gluing them, but it didn’t hold up. Only worn them a few dozen times. To have the Nike name brand, I would have expected a much better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kimbo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, doesnt lose cushion
customer_reviews.text: This was for a friend. The rev 3 in 8.5 extra wide is the only shoe he has found that is "perfect" and never gave him any pain but he couldn't find them anywhere in that size. He was more than thrilled and loves them
customer_reviews.author: Ginger K Winship

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love the look! Very comfortable. I got the 13 wide cause I have big feet. Sometimes a size 13 regular is too small so I got the wide size. I could have gotten away with just the 13. At least now my toes aren't being pinched.
customer_reviews.author: Dman503

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to pack in a backpack for weekend trips
customer_reviews.text: So hard to find shoes that are wide enough for my feet. These fit perfectly and are extremely light. Very easy to pack in a backpack for weekend trips. Have gotten compliments on the styling, kind of retro with a modern flare. Have been wearing them for work and weekends and have been holding up great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Technogeek

customer_reviews.title: Pretty solid shoe for the price
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is pretty comfortable, but provides zero ankle support. So if I'm running the track at the gym, I'm good going forward, then a bit careful rounding the ovals. But then again, this isn't a running shoe. I'm fairly happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Ali J

customer_reviews.title: Did not last three weeks
customer_reviews.text: Received these shoes less than three weeks ago and they already have large holes in both toes. Worst pair of shoes we have ever purchased. My son has worn them for running and general day to day wear. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Mason's Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My first pair of nikes and I am very pleased. I bought them a width wider and they feel very comfortable. Might buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits great
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to find good sneakers for wide foot men like me. These fit perfectly, and gives room to wiggle around, and it still looks like a regular Nike sneakers which are normally cut for people with thinner feet.
customer_reviews.author: Rude Bwoy

customer_reviews.title: 3 months and still good with a 14 year-old boy
customer_reviews.text: So used to sneakers and shoes starting to fall apart on my sons. They are very active-running around, biking, digging in the dirt- but these sneakers are lasting. He has very wide feet and these sneakers fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Happy customer

customer_reviews.title: Tried and true
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping was looking at these shoes for about a month even went to to a stop to try they on and ensure the fit was true to size. I am more than happy with this purchase and will definitely buy for this seller again. If your looking for quality running shoes look no further
customer_reviews.author: Sean Callahan

customer_reviews.title: I have had better luck with
customer_reviews.text: The Sneakers are way overpriced, for what one gets. The sole wore down quickly with just some minor walking. I have had better luck with Adidas
customer_reviews.author: The Unmasked Magician

customer_reviews.title: Very  good
customer_reviews.text: Love it I always buy this they become hard to find shipping was late by 1 day but worth the wait thanks good product not a replica 💯 original
customer_reviews.author: Jason D.

customer_reviews.title: Ya... it works
customer_reviews.text: Ive bought two pairs of these shoes over the past three years. I lift and run at least three times a week. Typical nike product... its nice until its not nice
customer_reviews.author: Dalton Lott

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these shoes. I wear the first pair every day for work, so I bought a new pair to keep clean and wear at all other times. They are very comfortable, and hold up well!
customer_reviews.author: Johnny W.

customer_reviews.title: Nike 4E
customer_reviews.text: I need Extra Wide running shoes. Very comfortable sneakers but not too many sizes or styles to choose from in the wide range. Easier than trying to find in a retail store though.
customer_reviews.author: Santo M Fontana

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and fit
customer_reviews.text: Bought for grandson. He put them on and they fit perfect. He has a wide foot and was pleased with the comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: So i bought these since i was in need of running shoes and wore the nike's rev 1 and remeber then being comfortable. I wear Vans and flat footed shoes alot and running kinda bothered my foot a bit but these shoes changed that very comfy and feel great on my feet even for long periods of time If you need something affordable and dont wanna buy over priced shoes but need something that can keep up with your daily workouts i higly reccomend these reason why it a 4 not a 5 its a little hard to clean these since the openings on the shoes make it easy for water to get in so avoid puddles
customer_reviews.author: Minton

customer_reviews.title: He really likes these and they are comfortable to him
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to find shoes that fit my son. He's a 6'5" 300lb offensive lineman. He really likes these and they are comfortable to him.
customer_reviews.author: Wendi Nickel

customer_reviews.title: Way too narrow at the midfoot for a 4E width
customer_reviews.text: Perfect wide 4E width toe box, but the shoe is just too narrow at the midfoot. Without that midfoot support my feet twist inward with every step.
customer_reviews.author: ISM

customer_reviews.title: poor quality, but hey, they look nice?!??
customer_reviews.text: They look nice for a short while but Nike shoe products hug. They never last long before breaking down. Unfortunately my hubby and 2 boys love the look. so its a gurantee repurchase more often than id like
customer_reviews.author: Julie Julie

customer_reviews.title: My son thinks I found the perfect sneaker!
customer_reviews.text: My son has been looking for a replacement for his old sneakers that look almost the same - they were a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nike Strike it
customer_reviews.text: I loved these and they were a great price unfortunately my husband’s feet did not like them. I bought a half size too small for him.
customer_reviews.author: Chardonae Davis

customer_reviews.title: long lasting
customer_reviews.text: longest lasting walking shoe I ever had.Last pair walked 4 miles daily for a year and still had some meat left in them.
customer_reviews.author: Aristides Castillo

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: What I like is it is exactly the shoe we bought at a high dollars shoe store, not some knock off
customer_reviews.author: Staci Webb

customer_reviews.title: Score!
customer_reviews.text: Found an awesome deal on here! The red ones look great! They fit pretty much like all the Nike running shoes so if you know the size of Nike you usually wear then these will fit the same.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Not very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Insole not very comfortable! I used them on the treadmill once & the bottom of my feet hurt!
customer_reviews.author: John Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and light weight - available in wide sizes.
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised with the shoes. I have a wide foot normally it is hard to find Nike shoes - these are great. Very comfortable to wear and light weight. Had for less than a week, so not sure how they will wear.
customer_reviews.author: TOMB

customer_reviews.title: I am on my feet a lot and they are comfortable just wish I had bought 1/2 to 1 size ...
customer_reviews.text: They fit slightly bigger than store bought nikes. I am on my feet a lot and they are comfortable just wish I had bought 1/2 to 1 size smaller or just returned for smaller size. But overall an okay product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: The look is great and the fit is perfect
customer_reviews.text: The look is great and the fit is perfect. I eouldnt give it the 5 stars only because its not as comfortable as other nike shoes ive owned. Dont get me wrong these are comfortable its just that the sole feels a bit hard. They are really light and look great.
customer_reviews.author: Erick

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable and athletic shoes I've ever worn. They worked perfectly on trails and walking the sidewalks. Your feet stay nicely cool because of the mesh fabric.
customer_reviews.author: norman

customer_reviews.title: Super duper comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Very very comfortable. most comfortable sneakers I ever had. Very light. Good arch support. Walked over 120 miles in a week in them and my feet felt great.
customer_reviews.author: jim b

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes by Nike
customer_reviews.text: Nike makes great athletic shoes, and these are wonderful. I bought them in the black and red. They look cool. Sometimes athletic shoes can be too heavy and uncomfortable after wearing them all day, but these are extremely lite and comfortable. They are holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: greeneyes007

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe. Simple but stylish. I read a lot of reviews before purchasing and eventually chose it as i liked how it looked on some of the guys feet in the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: ms pam

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Slipped them on and they were really comfortable from the very beginning.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: Love the grey, very stylish. Item fits woman size 12 or 13 perfectly. Shoes were promptly shipped.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Great value here
customer_reviews.text: Great gym and running shoes, great price....wish I couldve gotten black but the red's were only 35 bucks and they feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Love 'em
customer_reviews.text: The size was exactly right as my son wears an 11 so I bought 11 and they're a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: ML O.

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love these because the style is perfectly simple and clean, and they are comfortable and airy. If you have flat feet, they may be uncomfortable until you get used to them. Also, if you have wide feet, they may not be for you, as they are a bit narrow. These tips come from a friend who borrowed them after forgetting hers for a run.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very stiff and uncomfortable on the arches. Might update the review after they are more worn in
customer_reviews.author: marc dains

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Terrific! Very comfortable from the moment i put them on. Best running shoe i've had yet!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit if you have wide feet.
customer_reviews.text: No dislikes. I use this product for walking and running on treadmill. They are very light and comfortable. This is my 2nd. Pair that I bought.
customer_reviews.author: samedin23

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Have bought these in the past, will buy again. Only shoe my son likes, and he is very picky!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal L. Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Heel may have a problem.
customer_reviews.text: It feels like the heels want roll inward I don't know if it's the shoe or me.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin R Adams

customer_reviews.title: Narrow shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very narrow. Like narrow enough that it should be noted in the description. But b/c it’s a cloth shoe, she will be able to stretch it out a little.
customer_reviews.author: Midnight Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my boyfriend who wore out his last pair of Nikes. And he LOVES them. Very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Mary Bear

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Been using these fine for about a year. I do some street running but mostly train indoors. Second pair of long lasting nikes so I’m satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Agnello

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected and great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Just finished my first 2.5 mile run ontreadmill and bike workout. I had overworn my las Nike’s, I have an old back injury at it was acting up. These shoes felt immediately comfortable and my back feels great!! Great buy. Couldn’t be happier thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Junky

customer_reviews.title: Watch the selection size chart.
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe, but selection size doesn't match what they send.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: They are sized perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, used them for running and just everyday wear. They have nice bright red color, a nice look and they put a spring in my step.
customer_reviews.author: johnpratt

customer_reviews.title: running shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Nike Revolution 3 running shoes - the first pair lasted so much longer than the off brand shoes I had been buying - they fit well - wear well - worth the money for the brand name
customer_reviews.author: dwync

customer_reviews.title: Light weight quality shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these shoes. Even though they are light weight for walking or running they are very durable. First pair lasted longer than any other athletic shoe that I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: H. Riemenschneider

customer_reviews.title: Brand new and great fit
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were delivered quickly and were new in the box. The shoes are comfortable and have run in them once so far. Good quality and great bounce.
customer_reviews.author: C. Szorc

customer_reviews.title: Good, after the 5th mile
customer_reviews.text: I should start with I’m just a beginner in running, but dang it took its time to break into the shoes, after that they perform nicely, wish they had a softer cushion though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like these. At 1st I thought they were too ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. At 1st I thought they were too tight. I can wear a 10 - 10.5. So I went with the smaller size. They are great on my morning walks. I'm a bodybuilder, so I need cushioning. I also ran in them for a short burst. They felt great.
customer_reviews.author: SirNagrom

customer_reviews.title: Walking on air
customer_reviews.text: Used as a walking sneaker. Nice and comfortable, and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Paul D. Moses

customer_reviews.title: Very good shoe.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these and I really find them comfortable and the fit is true to size. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Willow

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and Style - Nike Revolution 3s don't disappoint
customer_reviews.text: These extremely comfortable shoes fit perfectly. I bought them on a whim before a business trip and they've become my go to shoe for walking, wearing jeans, playing with the dog, and just plain chillin'!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Lyles

product_meta.title: Nike Men's Revolution 3 Competition Running Shoes
product_meta.description: The Nike Revolution 3 Trainers for men have the following features: The Nike Revolution 3 sports shoes for men are sporty trainers are perfectly suited to todays fashion picture set. The surface is made of mesh which give the shoe breathable properties. Around the ankle The shoe with a soft has upholstery for a comfortable fit. The EVA midsole provides a perfect absorption. Features: Nike sport trainers for men Mesh upper EVA midsole Rubber outsole Colour: blue/grey
feature_bullets: Mesh upper for ultimate comfort and breathability
